name: BOT107
description:
BOT107 is a puzzle game in which you love so much your robots that you want them to escape from the factory.

The factory is being demolished. You control Amy, Pepe, Charlie and Darling throughout the stages. Your steps are limited by their life source energy. Your goal is to escape the factory and reach Arthur, the man in love with them who is making the factory go on till they escape.

The mechanics are brain teasers - with pretty cool obstacles, if we may say so. 
Take your time.
Keyboard controls only.

The game was made for an university class semester's project. In which:
Bruno Ribeiro programmed and designed all levels
Diego Pontes was our sound guy
Ian Quint took care of the lore and character design and animation
Rachel Freire made all other arts
Rudá Moreira was the producer and scrum master

We hope you enjoy it!

  • Steps Puzzle room!
  • Top down with cute robots
  • Factory music beat
  • Good number of stages!
